TITLE: Student Support Services
DEF: Institutional resources for helping students succeed academically and personally
TASK: The Student Support Services pattern comprises a range of resources designed to promote academic and personal success among students. It achieves its purpose by offering comprehensive assistance, such as academic advising, career counseling, and mental health support. Enhancing the effectiveness of this pattern relies on streamlined access to resources, use of AI tools for identifying and monitoring student needs, and cultivating a supportive campus culture.
